author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: +bugs is a guild where users should post about any bugs they find in Ruqqus (software bugs ofc, not insects). That way there is a convenient feed for the admins to address these problems, and the important ones can be resolved quicker. So please make a post there if you find a bug, and hopefully the admins will be made aware of it and fix it if necessary.
body_html: +bugs is a guild where users should post about any bugs they find in Ruqqus (software bugs ofc, not insects). That way there is a convenient feed for the admins to address these problems, and the important ones can be resolved quicker. So please make a post there if you find a bug, and hopefully the admins will be made aware of it and fix it if necessary.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

ðŸ’» No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

ðŸŸª Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

ðŸ˜€ Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, donâ€™t be a jerk.

body: There was a biggass mosquito inside my car this morning, but I took care of it. Should I let +bugs know and have the admins clean up the mess?
